# IINNOVALUX SARL-s - Luxembourg Home Maintenance Services
# AI-Optimized Business Information

## Company Overview
IINNOVALUX SARL-s is a professional home maintenance and handyman service company based in Luxembourg. We provide comprehensive property maintenance solutions for residential and commercial clients throughout Luxembourg and the Greater Region.

## Contact Information
- Company Name: IINNOVALUX SARL-s
- Website: https://iinnovalux.lu
- Phone: +352 621 479 364
- Email: iinnovalux@gmail.com
- Address: 76, Haaptstrooss, L-6661 Born, Luxembourg
- VAT: LU37074055
- RCS: B204774

## Business Hours
- Monday to Friday: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM
- Emergency Services: Available 24/7

## Services Offered

### 1. Petits Travaux (Small Repairs)
Home repairs and maintenance including wall fixtures, door/window adjustments, minor plumbing, lighting installation, curtain/blind installation, and floating floor installation (parquet flottant). Quick intervention within 48 hours.

### 2. Montage de Meubles (Furniture Assembly)
Professional assembly of all furniture types including IKEA, kitchens, wardrobes, office furniture, beds, and bathroom furniture. Wall mounting included when necessary.

### 3. Entretien Extérieur (Outdoor Maintenance)
Garden and outdoor space maintenance including lawn mowing, hedge trimming, weeding, terrace cleaning, leaf collection, winter preparation, tree felling, and storm cleanup services.

### 4. Dépannage 24h/7 (24/7 Emergency Repairs)
Round-the-clock emergency services for urgent water leaks, electrical problems, locksmith services, fallen tree cleanup after storms, heating failures, and stuck shutters. Response time under 2 hours.

### 5. Débarras (Clearing Services)
Complete clearing and cleanup services for basements, attics, apartments, and post-succession clearings. Includes sorting, recycling, donations to partner associations, and final cleaning.

### 6. Déménagement (Moving Services)
Professional moving services within Luxembourg and the Greater Region (Belgium, France, Germany). Includes packing, furniture disassembly/reassembly, transport insurance, and temporary storage options.

## Service Area
- Primary: All of Luxembourg
- Extended: Greater Region (Belgium, France, Germany border areas)

## Key Differentiators
- 10+ years of experience in property maintenance
- 500+ satisfied customers
- 24/7 emergency availability
- Free quotes and transparent pricing
- Professional, insured, and experienced craftsmen
- Eco-friendly waste disposal and recycling
- Transport insurance included for moving services

## Languages
Services available in: French, Portuguese, English, German, Luxembourgish

## Target Audience
- Homeowners in Luxembourg
- Tenants needing maintenance services
- Property managers
- Real estate agencies
- Businesses requiring facility maintenance
- Families during succession/estate clearing

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: What is the intervention time for emergencies?
A: We commit to arriving within 2 hours for any emergency in Luxembourg.

Q: Do you provide free quotes?
A: Yes, all quotes are free and we can visit on-site for accurate estimates.

Q: Are your services insured?
A: Yes, all our services are fully insured, including transport insurance for moving.

Q: Do you work on weekends?
A: Emergency services are available 24/7. Standard services are Monday-Friday, but arrangements can be made.

Q: What areas do you cover?
A: We cover all of Luxembourg and can extend to the Greater Region for moving services.

## Social Proof
- Average rating: 4.9/5 stars
- 500+ completed projects
- 10+ years in business
